familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Capital Gains income from JKM CAPITAL, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser. Underlying assets are not disclosed due to preexisting confidentiality agreement. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: JKM Capital, LLC (Interest In Venture Capital Fund; New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Capital Gains income from JKM CAPITAL, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Underlying assets are not disclosed due to preexisting confidentiality agreement. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: JKM Capital, LLC (Interest In Venture Capital Fund; New York, NY)
